entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
